original_title: The Meditation Film Project (Drop the Suitcase)
overview: Arts and Healing, meditation films project, meditating film taking it a step further in meditation, linking the masses through this films project! For kids and Adults! Creating change of peace through films of meditations. Destroy all negative thoughts and think positive while raising consciousness. Director: Cice Rivera, Host: Featuring Jerry Burnham
title: The Meditation Film Project (Drop the Suitcase)
